title: Stuck on 'authenticating'?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
OCE beta client stuck on 'authenticating' when logging in?

- PLEASE UPVOTE IF HAVING SAME PROBLEM -

replies.body: Having the exact same problem, and have tried everything i can think of. Please Help!!
i just logged in after trying 4 times, chat took a minute to load.
I am having a same problem. Cannot login.
